about_the_game:
You are a Trailblazer... the captain of a Landship, a powerful vessel shaped by undying dedication and boundless dreams. It is your lifeline through The March, a perilous frontier that thrives by engulfing civilization's remnants. Your mission: blaze a trail across this wilderness and uncover the mystery at its heart.

Trailblazers: Into the March is a roguelite colony-sim that integrates tactical combat with the emotional journey of fully simulated characters. Before setting off you will purchase and customize your Landship, recruit crew members with their own backgrounds and skills, trade supplies and materials, and take on contracts. Once you venture into the March you will have to carefully manage your crew's daily lives, witness their evolving relationships and stories, and defend your moving home in tactical landship battles as you explore the vast, uncharted territories.

In Trailblazers: Into the March, your crew is more than procedural NPCs: they're the companions who will share your struggles and triumphs. Each member is unique, with their own background, skills, and aspirations. Witness their evolution as you navigate The March's unforgiving wilds, nurture their needs, and forge bonds that shape your experience. From creating unexpected friendships to helping them overcome their pasts, your ties with your crew will add unforgettable moments to your exploration.

Your Landship is more than just a vessel: it's a customizable community, your sanctuary in the wilderness. These colossal machines are the heart of your operations, allowing you to push deeper into The March with each journey. Strategic planning is key as you outfit your Landship, manage its resources, and navigate the challenges of space and logistics. Every decision matters as you chart a course through the unknown, forging a path towards the heart of The March.

Engage in tactical landship-to-landship combat amidst the boundless expanse of The March. Real-time action blends with tactical pause, making every skirmish a test of wit and skill. Command your crew and adapt to the shifting battlefield: the morale of your characters will directly impact their performance, adding another layer of strategic depth to each encounter. Victory or defeat – every battle is a testament to your resilience.

The journey is just as important as the destination. Explore the vast and mysterious expanse of The March, encountering enigmatic wonders and unpredictable events along the way. Death is not the end: with each expedition you will keep your progress on the ever-changing grounds of The March, pushing further into the unknown with each daring foray. Embrace the thrill of discovery, uncover the secrets that lie hidden in the depths, and leave your mark as a true Trailblazer.
detailed_description:
Join other Trailblazers!

name: Trailblazers: Into the March

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

short_description: Embark on a thrilling adventure in this roguelite colony-sim strategy game. Command your Landship in tactical battles, care for a crew composed of all sorts of characters, shape your home, manage resources, and lead expeditions into the March. Discover what lies at its heart... and in yours.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
